Business news

Budget
Russia ' s budget expenditure accelerated sharply to 150 billion a day in February
In the first half of February, federal budget expenditure increased significantly to 2.05 trillion roubles. This was reported by the Office.
12:29, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Housing
In Petersburg, secondary housing prices increased by only 0.5 per cent
In February 2024, the prices of finished housing in Petersburg increased by 0.5 per cent compared to January. The square metre averages 218,600 roubles.
12:02, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Investments
Foreign investment in the Finnish economy fell to 2019
Last year, Finland received 247 new foreign companies, much less than in the previous two years (300 new companies in 2022 and 330 in 2021).
11:56, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Labour market
NAO has been identified as the most promising for work in the SLF after Petersburg and Len regions
The German Autonomous Region (NAO) ranking the employment prospects of the Requiring Service HeadHunter became the third most attractive in the North-West Federal District after Lenblasty and Petersburg.
11:22, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Real property
Business class sales in Petersburg dropped by 12 per cent, prices increased by 9 per cent
As I found in the consulting company.NF Groupin 2023, a total area of 237,000 m2 was added to the market (sold) 3,400 apartments and business class apartments. In a year, the number of lots sold increased by 7 per cent. Growth resulted from new projects entering the market. Sales started in 11 new sites in five areas of the city, the largest of which were: Sampsoniev, 32, AVANT and 2-6 in 17/33 Petrov Island. The total area for sale was 168,000 m2.
10:52, 19 February 2024♪
Pavel Nikiforov
Resignations and appointments
The automobile manufacturer changed the CEO
Since 16 February, Gennady has been appointed Director-General of the Gatsina Crizo launch The servant, the contract with him for a term of five years, is referred to in the enterprise ' s communication with reference to the decision of the board of directors. According to open sources, previously Gennady He was the first Deputy Director General.
10:41, 19 February 2024♪
Svetlan Afonina
Economy
Polymetal sells Russian assets to Mangazei Mining.
Polymetal entered into an agreement to sell Russian business. The buyer is the Mangasey Plus, the Mangasey Mining Company, in the Polymetal message.
10:35, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Real property
Historical mansion on the English coast sells 1.1 billion roubles
In Petersburg, the historic building on the English coast near the Broadcasted Bridge was sold. Special sales for 1.1 billion roubles.
10:23, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Labour market
Len oblast passed Petersburg and Moscow in the rating of regions to find work.
The Len Region ranked seventh in the rating of the FM regions on employment prospects.
09:58, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Exports
The share of roubles in exports and imports to Europe declined again below 50 per cent
The share of roubles in export and import calculations with European countries again was less than half, only 49 per cent after December 2023. That's what Central Bank's data say.
09:23, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Internet
Mass leaks have helped to identify the most popular passwords in Russia
The researchers analysed some 44 million new unique accounting records. The sources of information for analysts were shadow forums and telegram channels, where mass leaks are made publicly available, as well as various password recovery communities.
09:06, 19 February 2024♪
Karash Nogaeva
Mega
Gazprombank will lease the IKEA trade area in Megs.
The IKEA mags in the Mega Trade Centres will be hosting new tenants in 2024. This was reported by the Gazprombank Tigran Hachaturov RIA News.
08:58, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Labour market
Petburjers have become more likely to be employed in foreign companies. Kazakhstan, Belarus, Georgia
In 2023, the inhabitants of Petersburg received over 70,000 invitations from foreign employers. That's a third (27%) more than 2022.
08:54, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Finance
Alcoholic shares have led to the party.
The Russian stock market will be able to analyse company reports this week. Union and Rusgidro. The first will publish financial results for IFRS for 2023 on 19 February and the second for the fourth quarter of the same year on 21 February.
08:34, 19 February 2024♪
Alexander Pyrochav
Construction
Deeply dug, how archaeological intelligence reform will affect Petersburg
At the beginning of February, a decree of the Government of Russia on regulations for archaeological exploration ( " The characteristics of the procedure for determining the existence or absence of objects bearing the characteristics of the archaeological heritage in territories subject to the effects of land, construction, meloorative, economic works " ) came into force. How it works for Petersburg is still not clear.
08:28, 19 February 2024♪
Vadim Kuzmitzky, Pavel Nikiforov
Construction
Dogma's Krasnodar builder will buy the ex-Normann in Len regionali.
The Red Dweller Dogma will buy a section of the Normann C.C. for 841.6 million roubles.
08:24, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Management
The Petersburg CB led the top management of the Rostacha from Catherineburg.
On 25 January, the PCB-Avotomatics, which is located in the territory of the Kirova factory, has been headed by Nikolai Bednikov, a top manager known as Ural Transmash. He took up a new post after leaving the post of Executive Director of the Ural enterprise.
08:06, 19 February 2024♪
Lev Godovnik
Procurement
The company spent 682 billion roubles on the small business of Petersburg
According to data released at the end of last week by the First Vice-President of the Government of the Russian Federation, Andrei Belousov, the total amount of purchases made in 2023 by small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) was almost 8 trillion roubles. This is a record since the introduction of a mandatory quota for small and medium-sized business procurement (which is controlled by the SME and Region Corporation). The annual increase was 13.5 per cent.
07:54, 19 February 2024♪
Darya Dimitrieva
Housing
Petersburg is in second place for the introduction of housing in Russia. And 34 lines per capita
Petersburg ranked the second line in the Russian housing construction rating in absolute values of housing, but only 34 places in the number of new square metres per citizen.
07:47, 19 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Judicial disputes
Petersburg instead of Hong Kong, RushimAllans recovered from Linde 144 billion.
On 16 February, the Court of Arbitration of St. Petersburg and Leningrad oblast upheld the RushimAllans claim to the German end of Linde for the recovery of 993 million euros and 44 billion roubles under the contract for the design and construction of the gas refinery in Ust-Lug. The operative part of the decision has not yet been published.
07:45, 19 February 2024♪
Ilya Slove

info.title: Russia ' s budget expenditure accelerated sharply to 150 billion a day in February
info.short_text: In the first half of February, federal budget expenditure increased significantly to 2.05 trillion roubles. This was reported by the Office.

info.title: In Petersburg, secondary housing prices increased by only 0.5 per cent
info.short_text: In February 2024, the prices of finished housing in Petersburg increased by 0.5 per cent compared to January. The square metre averages 218,600 roubles.

info.title: Foreign investment in the Finnish economy fell to 2019
info.short_text: Last year, Finland received 247 new foreign companies, much less than in the previous two years (300 new companies in 2022 and 330 in 2021).

info.title: NAO has been identified as the most promising for work in the SLF after Petersburg and Len regions
info.short_text: The German Autonomous Region (NAO) ranking the employment prospects of the Requiring Service HeadHunter became the third most attractive in the North-West Federal District after Lenblasty and Petersburg.

info.title: Business class sales in Petersburg dropped by 12 per cent, prices increased by 9 per cent
info.short_text: According to the NF Group Consulting Company, in 2023, 3.4 thousand apartments and business class absorption were exposed to the market in a total area of 237,000 m2. In a year, the number of lots sold increased by 7 per cent. Growth resulted from new projects entering the market. Sales started in 11 new sites in five areas of the city, the largest of which were: Sampsoniev, 32, AVANT and 2-6 in 17/33 Petrov Island. The total area for sale was 168,000 m2.

info.title: The automobile manufacturer changed the CEO
info.short_text: Since 16 February, the Director-General of the Criso Company from Gatchina has been appointed Gennady Slugin, a contract with him for a period of five years, referred to in the enterprise ' s communication with reference to the decision of the board of directors. According to open sources, Gennady Slougin previously served as Deputy Director General.

info.title: Polymetal sells Russian assets to Mangazei Mining.
info.short_text: Polymetal entered into an agreement to sell Russian business. The buyer is the Mangasey Plus, the Mangasey Mining Company, in the Polymetal message.
